Description: As an Admin I can access a Template Builder workspace with drag-and-drop interface component panel canvas and properties panel for building tender templates

As an Admin I have access to predefined blocks (General Information Project Details Requisition & Lots Scope & Requirements Timeline Submission Requirements Evaluation Team) that I can add to templates
As a System I have a comprehensive data model and REST API for template CRUD operations including block configurations and field definitions
As an Admin I can view search filter create edit duplicate and delete templates in a library view

As an Admin I can configure the General Information block with fields for title reference sourcing/solicitation type requirement type description modalities and related metadata with conditional field visibility

As an Admin I can configure Project & Tender Details block including project information funding sources and comprehensive tender particulars (scope requirements commercial conditions payment terms securities etc)
As an Admin I can configure how requisition lines from ERP are displayed and how lots can be created and managed by tender authors
As an Admin I can configure requirements definition including product specifications (attribute-based or description-based) service descriptions and delivery requirements
As an Admin I can configure bid response structure including submission details and multi-level supplier questions (per bid per UNSPSC per attribute per service line per delivery requirement)
As an Admin I can configure evaluation methods and define evaluation criteria that can be applied to entire tender or specific UNSPSC codes
As an Admin I can configure deadline fields and team member roles with integration to organizational directory
As an Admin I can configure individual fields including field type label required/optional status default values validation rules help text and placeholder text
As an Admin I can define conditional visibility rules where fields appear or hide based on values of other fields
As an Admin I can use various field types: text textarea number date datetime dropdown multi-select checkbox radio file upload search/autocomplete rich text editor
As an Admin I can add custom fields to blocks beyond the predefined fields to meet specific organizational needs
As an Admin I can save templates with automatic versioning view version history and revert to previous versions
As an Admin I can manage template status (Draft/Published) to control availability for tender authors
As an Admin I can export templates as JSON and import them for backup sharing or migration across environments
As an Admin I can preview how a template will appear to tender authors before publishing
As a Procurement Officer I can initiate tender creation through a guided wizard that helps me select sourcing method requirement type and appropriate template
As a Procurement Officer the system suggests appropriate templates based on my selections and I can browse/search all available templates
As a Tender Author I have a workspace with progress tracking block navigation content area and supplementary panels for efficient tender creation
As a System I have a comprehensive data model and REST API for tender operations including all block data and supporting CRUD operations
As a Tender Author my work is automatically saved at regular intervals and I can return to drafts without losing progress
As a Tender Author I can complete all General Information fields with appropriate input types validation and real-time conditional field display based on template configuration
As a Tender Author I can complete Project & Tender Details including project information particulars and all subsections with conditional field logic
As a Tender Author I can view requisition lines imported from ERP systems with all line item details
As a Tender Author I can create lots assign names add UNSPSC products with quantities and manage lot structure
As a Tender Author I can define product requirements for each UNSPSC code using either structured attributes (name-value pairs) or rich text descriptions and I can bulk import/export via Excel
As a Tender Author I can define service descriptions delivery requirements and other specific requirements as configured in the template
As a Tender Author I can configure what information suppliers must provide at different levels (per bid per UNSPSC per attribute per service per delivery) with ability to add custom fields
As a Tender Author I can define evaluation criteria including type description evaluation method and whether criteria apply to entire tender or specific UNSPSC codes
As a Tender Author I can search and assign team members to various roles (authors reviewers authorities technical experts evaluation team) from organizational directory
As a Tender Author I can set key dates including submission deadline clarification deadline and expected award date with validation
As a Tender Author I can access a form library panel and drag-and-drop forms (including DRiVE sustainability form) into tender sections
As a Tender Author I can upload supporting documents with file validation view all uploaded documents and manage document lifecycle
As a System I securely store documents in cloud storage with proper access controls and provide secure download URLs
As a System I validate tender completeness checking all required fields conditional field requirements and business rule compliance with clear error reporting
As a Tender Author I can see visual indicators of completion status for each block and overall tender progress
As a Tender Author I can submit tender for review; as a Reviewer I can review comment and approve/reject; as a Procurement Authority I can publish approved tenders
As a System I manage tender status transitions (Draft Under Review Approved Published) with appropriate access controls and notifications
As a Tender Author I can preview how my tender will appear to suppliers including supplier form preview showing what suppliers will need to complete
As a Procurement Officer I can view all my tenders in a list/grid with search filter (by status date author template) and sort capabilities with pagination
As an Admin I can view all templates in a list/grid with search filter by status and see template details including blocks and field counts
As a System I have database structures to store and manage forms library including form metadata versions and content references
As a System I have REST APIs to create read update delete list and search forms in the library
As a System I have database and API support for document templates library that can be reused across tenders
As a System I integrate with DRiVE application to make sustainability forms available in form library and handle form submissions
As a System I integrate with oneUNOPS (RDAT) to provide user search functionality for team member assignments with auto-complete capabilities
As a System I integrate with oneUNOPS to fetch organizational data (work packages projects funding sources organizational units)
As a System I integrate with ERP systems to fetch requisition lines including line items UNSPSC codes quantities amounts and other requisition metadata
As a System I maintain UNSPSC code master data and provide validation and lookup services
As a User I have reusable search field components with auto-complete debounced search and result selection for integrated data sources
As a User I experience a modern design system with refined color palette typography shadows gradient buttons smooth transitions and card-based layouts
As a User I can access a WCAG AA compliant interface with proper color contrast keyboard navigation screen reader support and visible focus indicators
As a User I can access the application on different screen sizes with responsive layouts that adapt appropriately
As a System I implement secure authentication (OAuth 2.0/SAML) and role-based access control for Admin Procurement Officer Reviewer and Author roles
As a System I validate and sanitize all user inputs to prevent SQL injection XSS and CSRF attacks
As a System I encrypt sensitive data at rest in database and in transit using HTTPS/TLS
As a System I log all critical actions (template/tender creation and modifications user authentication data access) for audit and compliance
As a System I optimize performance with code splitting lazy loading database query optimization caching and ensure API response times under 500ms for 95th percentile
As a System I handle large file uploads efficiently with chunked upload progress tracking and resumable uploads
As a Developer I have comprehensive unit tests for frontend components with 80%+ code coverage
As a Developer I have unit and integration tests for all API endpoints and business logic with 80%+ code coverage
As a Developer I have E2E tests for critical user journeys (create template create tender submit for review publish)
As a Product Owner I have conducted UAT with stakeholders covering all user stories and incorporated feedback
As a Developer I have comprehensive API documentation with Swagger/OpenAPI specs request/response examples and authentication details
As a Developer I have architecture documentation data models developer setup guide and troubleshooting information
As a User I have comprehensive guides for template building and tender authoring with screenshots and step-by-step instructions
As a DevOps Engineer I have CI/CD pipeline with automated builds test execution and deployment to staging and production environments
As a DevOps Engineer I have production infrastructure with load balancing auto-scaling monitoring logging and backup strategy
As a DevOps Engineer I have monitoring and alerting for application metrics errors performance and uptime
